name: Shoelace! The great misadventures of Dr. Karlovisky and his "Demonies"
name_original: Shoelace! The great misadventures of Dr. Karlovisky and his "Demonies"
description: This was a game made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam. I had never participated on a game jam before making this game, and i hope you like the result!
